> - dph_of_rules deserves a special thanks for creating his scenario 
pack, which we used to stress test the game and catch some bugs and  
slowdowns (especially his scenario 150).

:-)

My goal was to test the limits of the game.  I'm confident that I know 
the limits of the game.
